payload.content: ClawPod is an OpenClaw skill that integrates an agent's browser or unblocking API with @joinmassive's residential proxy network, routing requests through a swarm of real residential IPs to make each site perceive a real user instead of a bot.

name: ClawPod is an OpenClaw skill that integrates an agent's browser or unblocking AP
content: ClawPod is an OpenClaw skill that integrates an agent's browser or unblocking API with @joinmassive's residential proxy network, routing requests through a swarm of real residential IPs to make each site perceive a real user instead of a bot.

payload.content: A single IP address making hundreds of requests per hour from an OpenClaw agent is identifiable as a bot, leading to sites rejecting requests with 403 errors, wasting tokens and API calls.

name: A single IP address making hundreds of requests per hour from an OpenClaw agent
content: A single IP address making hundreds of requests per hour from an OpenClaw agent is identifiable as a bot, leading to sites rejecting requests with 403 errors, wasting tokens and API calls.

payload.content: Geo-restricted content is inaccessible to OpenClaw agents if their local IP does not match the required region, preventing access to region-specific data like pricing or product listings.

name: Geo-restricted content is inaccessible to OpenClaw agents if their local IP does
content: Geo-restricted content is inaccessible to OpenClaw agents if their local IP does not match the required region, preventing access to region-specific data like pricing or product listings.

payload.content: The inability of AI agents (including Claude's web access and ChatGPT's browsing) to reliably load webpages due to bot detection is a significant, often overlooked, bottleneck in AI development.

name: The inability of AI agents (including Claude's web access and ChatGPT's browsing
content: The inability of AI agents (including Claude's web access and ChatGPT's browsing) to reliably load webpages due to bot detection is a significant, often overlooked, bottleneck in AI development.

payload.content: While residential proxies solve the IP problem by routing requests through real internet connections, they are insufficient alone because modern websites also check for JavaScript execution, proper browser fingerprints, cookie handling, and real rendering, flagging raw HTTP requests.

name: While residential proxies solve the IP problem by routing requests through real
content: While residential proxies solve the IP problem by routing requests through real internet connections, they are insufficient alone because modern websites also check for JavaScript execution, proper browser fingerprints, cookie handling, and real rendering, flagging raw HTTP requests.

payload.content: ClawPod enables OpenClaw agents to open any URL through a residential IP, get fully rendered page content (JavaScript, SPAs, dynamic loading), take screenshots, get accessibility snapshots for structured data extraction, target specific countries, cities, or zipcodes, and use sticky sessions to maintain the same IP across multiple pages.

name: ClawPod enables OpenClaw agents to open any URL through a residential IP, get fu
content: ClawPod enables OpenClaw agents to open any URL through a residential IP, get fully rendered page content (JavaScript, SPAs, dynamic loading), take screenshots, get accessibility snapshots for structured data extraction, target specific countries, cities, or zipcodes, and use sticky sessions to maintain the same IP across multiple pages.

payload.content: To configure geo-targeting with ClawPod, encode the desired country (e.g., `country%3DDE` for Germany) or mobile type and city (e.g., `type%3Dmobile%26country%3DUS%26city%3DNew%20York`) directly into the proxy username.

name: To configure geo-targeting with ClawPod, encode the desired country (e.g., `coun
content: To configure geo-targeting with ClawPod, encode the desired country (e.g., `country%3DDE` for Germany) or mobile type and city (e.g., `type%3Dmobile%26country%3DUS%26city%3DNew%20York`) directly into the proxy username.

payload.content: ClawPod's agent-browser automatically handles JS rendering, redirects, cookies, and dynamic content like Chrome because it utilizes a Chrome-based browser.

name: ClawPod's agent-browser automatically handles JS rendering, redirects, cookies,
content: ClawPod's agent-browser automatically handles JS rendering, redirects, cookies, and dynamic content like Chrome because it utilizes a Chrome-based browser.

payload.content: Massive's Unblocker API will handle challenging sites, Cloudflare, CAPTCHAs, and anti-bot bypass, returning clean rendered content without requiring users to manage browser sessions, using the same residential proxy infrastructure and geo-targeting.

name: Massive's Unblocker API will handle challenging sites, Cloudflare, CAPTCHAs, and
content: Massive's Unblocker API will handle challenging sites, Cloudflare, CAPTCHAs, and anti-bot bypass, returning clean rendered content without requiring users to manage browser sessions, using the same residential proxy infrastructure and geo-targeting.

payload.content: Future developments for ClawPod include bandwidth sharing, where users can contribute idle bandwidth to the Massive network in exchange for proxy and unblocker credits, mirroring Massive's existing model with over 10 million opted-in users.

name: Future developments for ClawPod include bandwidth sharing, where users can contr
content: Future developments for ClawPod include bandwidth sharing, where users can contribute idle bandwidth to the Massive network in exchange for proxy and unblocker credits, mirroring Massive's existing model with over 10 million opted-in users.
